jodd.madvoc.component

Class WrapperManager<T extends ActionWrapper>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.component.WrapperManager<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiltersManager, InterceptorsManager

    public abstract class WrapperManager<T extends ActionWrapper>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base wrapper manager implements common logic of a wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        protected java.util.Set<T> getAll()
        Returns all action wrappers. Returns a copy in new set.

      • lookup

        public T lookup(java.lang.String name)
        Looks up for existing wrapper. Returns null if wrapper is not already registered.

      • resolve

        public T resolve(java.lang.Class<? extends T> wrapperClass)
        Resolves single wrapper. Creates new wrapper instance if not already registered. Does not expand the wrappers.

      • resolveAll

        public T[] resolveAll(java.lang.Class<? extends T>[] wrapperClasses)
        Resolves wrappers. Unregistered wrappers will be registered. Returned array may be different size than size of provided array, due to expanding.

      • createArray

        protected abstract T[] createArray(int len)
        Creates an array of wrapper instances.

      • initializeWrapper

        protected void initializeWrapper(T wrapper)
        Initializes action wrapper.

      • expand

        protected java.lang.Class<? extends T>[] expand(java.lang.Class<? extends T>[] actionWrappers)
        Replaces all BaseActionWrapperStack with stack values.

      • createWrapper

        protected <R extends T> R createWrapper(java.lang.Class<R> wrapperClass)
        Creates new wrapper.
